title: Most underrated movie of 2019
review: You will surely be amazed by performance of Christian Bale; Matt Damon was brilliant as well. You should definitely watch.

title: Greatest movie
review: The greatest movie of all time.... absolutely brilliant

title: Amazing
review: You will laugh, you will dance, you will celebrate, you will cry and you will be amazed. I have seen such an wonderful movie after so many days, and it deserved more oscars ( got only 1). Definitely watch the movie.
